entry.title: 基于Redis的MessageQueue队列封装
entry.content:
基于Redis的PHP消息队列封装

class RedisMessageQueue 
{
    protected $redis_server;
    protected $server;
    protected $port;
    protected $key;
    public function__construct($server_config=array('IP'=>'127.0.0.1','PORT'=>'6379'),$key=>'redis_message_queue',$p_connect=false)
    {
        if(empty($key))
        {
            throw new Exception('message queue key can not be empty);
            $this->server=$server_config['IP'];
            $this->port=$server_config['PORT'];
            $this->key=$key;
            $this->check_environment();
            if($p_connect){
                $this->pconnect();
            }else{
                $this->connect();
            }
        }       
    }
}
